name: Calculate Hours FDA Rack Configuration
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA Rack Configuration:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((8*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Workstations)*>))+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Workstations)*>)*0.25)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(<* Eval((8*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Workstations)*>))+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Workstations)*>)*0.25)) *>*0.5) *>}{<* Eval(<* Eval((8*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Workstations)*>))+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Workstations)*>)*0.25)) *>*0.5*1.1) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
